examples: The biryani, to me, feels like turkey on Thanksgiving.
There's like, as many biryanis as there are people in India, -
When we eat at our house on Thanksgiving, we'd always have a turkey, but also a biryani, and like you were saying, every family has their own recipe.
And like, definitely, people won't ever tell you their full recipe, or like, they'll leave out their secret ingredient that makes it their special biryani.
When we host a party, we usually serve, like, three to five types of meat that are like, really complicated and complex and delicious, and biryani's usually the center of that.
words.defineEn: a South Asian mixed rice dish that typically includes spices, herbs, vegetables, and meat or fish
words.defineVi: một món cơm trộn Nam Á thường bao gồm các loại gia vị, thảo mộc, rau và thịt hoặc cá

words.defineVi: ‌một món ăn làm từ thịt hoặc cá và kem hoặc sữa chua, có nguồn gốc từ Nam Á

examples: The ambassador curried favor with the dictator by praising his construction projects.
My sister skillfully cooks a flavorful curry for dinner.
They served white rice with the chicken curry.
She prepared a flavorful chicken curry with aromatic spices and coconut milk.
words.defineEn: a type of Indian dish made with meat, vegetables, etc., which is cooked in a hot sauce and then served with rice
